original_title: Shasheendra Rajapaksa gets State Minister Post
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Shasheendra Rajapaksa was sworn in as the State Minister for Irrigation and Water Resources Management.
He took oaths in the presence of President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the President's Office in Colombo, said the President's Media Division.
Police Detains 10 Protesters at CID Headquarters While Demanding Keheliya’s Arrest
